attributes.action: make it the law for all puppies to be taken to 8 weeks compulsary puppy training
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recent events have brought the fact that dogs, although they can on one hand be loving companions, can get vicious. This can be due to the dogs breed, but a lot of the time due to improper training. I think that compulsary 8 weeks puppy training on reciept of the dog and after their initial vaccinations, will lower the chance that they will grow up into vicious dogs, and even save lives.
